text: Roy Dana Call (February 16, 1950 â€“ February 27, 2020) was an American actor. He appeared in several movies including 48 Hrs. (1982), Brewster's Millions (1985), At Close Range (1986), No Man's Land (1987), Colors (1988), Born on the Fourth of July (1989), Young Guns II (1990), State of Grace (1990), Waterworld (1995), Murder by Numbers (2002), Babel (2006), and Into the Wild (2007). He was born in Ogden, Utah. Call was of the Mormon faith. He died on February 27, 2020 from back surgery-related problems at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:People from Ogden, Utah Category:Actors from Utah Category:1950 births
title: R. D. Call
